message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I can do $110, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95. Can you meet me at that price?
I'm getting closer to your price, Bob! I can do $115, but I think we can do better than that. Let me think for a moment...
I'm still willing to make a deal, but I really think $100 is the most I can stretch to. Can you meet me at that price?
I'm not quite ready to meet you at $100, Bob. I can do $110, and that's as low as I'm willing to go. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product.
I'm not willing to go above $105, that's my final offer. Can you meet me at that price?
